name: Sumbi - Destroy NFTs
description:
This is a game i made in 3 days with one idea. My friends told me how to make it. This game did cost me 20 usd to make so i do ask that you donate. 

You play as a clown that is sent to defend the Obama Nuke from the crawling troglodytes known as "Bored Apes." but they are anything but bored, they are Savages!  So you are assigned in this infinite wave nft game to take out as many as possible. 

I might make it multiplayer, so donate for that.

How to download:

1. Download the file, to download simply click on the file. You can choose between donating and downloading, donate if you want but click the download.

2. Extract the file

3 Click on the Item that has the NFT Monkey symbol on it, and enjoy

PS : the only way to close the game is Alt F4...
